definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: And the fairy mistress of dreams is coming towards you, flying through the twilight sky.
sentences.chinese: 仙鄉里的夢婆飛過朦朧的天空，向你飛來。

sentences.english: The country has organized a designated forest protection brigade to protect young growth from being damaged.
sentences.chinese: 鄉里專門組織了護林隊保護幼林不被破壞。

sentences.english: True, the peasants are in a sense " unruly" in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 的確的，農民在鄉里頗有一點子“亂來”。

sentences.english: The village opened a new factory specializing in deep-processing of highland barley .
sentences.chinese: 鄉里新開了一家專門進行元麥深加工的工廠。

sentences.english: These evil people are still playing tyrants.
sentences.chinese: 這些腐惡的勢力依舊橫行鄉里。

sentences.english: In Han Dynasty, elite class included merchant elite and township elites.
sentences.chinese: 漢代豪民在類型上可大致劃分爲工商豪民和鄉里豪民。

sentences.english: He is very keen to see his hometown when more.
sentences.chinese: 他很想再一次看看他的鄉里。

sentences.english: The elite in the Han Dynasty can be divided into commercial elite and farm elite.
sentences.chinese: 漢代豪民在類型上可劃分爲工商豪民和鄉里豪民。

sentences.english: The fairy mistress of dreams is coming towards you, flying through the twilight sky.
sentences.chinese: 仙鄉里的夢婆飛過朦朧的天空，向你飛來。

sentences.english: The village carpenter is repairing an upturned dinghy under a big aswatha tree.
sentences.chinese: 鄉里的木匠在大樹下修着翻倒的小艇。

sentences.english: A small factory which produces especially prefabricated boards has opened in the village .
sentences.chinese: 鄉里新開了一家專門生產預製板的小工廠。

sentences.english: That teach the rustic moralist to die.
sentences.chinese: 教訓鄉里的道德家們怎樣去死。

sentences.english: The rich men in the village call every poor person a fool.
sentences.chinese: 鄉里的土財主們把窮人統稱爲愚氓。

sentences.english: The cooperations of each village in our county are combined together, and form the united cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 我們鄉里每個村的合作社組織到一起組成了聯社。

sentences.english: The peasants' revolt disturbed the gentry's sweet dreams.
sentences.chinese: 農民在鄉里造反，攪動了紳士們的酣夢。

sentences.english: Ren Sangxiao was known as the most handsome young man in the area he live.
sentences.chinese: 任桑曉是他所住的鄉里公認爲最英俊的一位年輕男子。

definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
Youyang Tujia and Miao Autonomous County in Chongqing
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
